updates.title: Microsoft Intune support for Apple AI features
updates.subtitle: New standalone settings for Genmojis, Writing tools, and screen capture
updates.content: Intune app protection policies have new standalone settings for Apple AI features (Genmojis, Writing tools, and screen capture). These settings are supported by apps updated to version 19.7.12+ for Xcode 15, and 20.4.0+ for Xcode 16.

updates.title: Add Enterprise App Catalog apps to ESP blocking apps list
updates.subtitle: Windows Autopilot now supports Enterprise App Catalog apps
updates.content: Windows Autopilot now supports Enterprise App Catalog apps. You can select apps from the Enterprise App Catalog as blocking apps in the Enrollment Status Page (ESP) and Device Preparation Page (DPP) profiles.
features: Enterprise App Catalog integration with Autopilot
Ensures app delivery before desktop access

updates.title: Managed Home Screen orientation changes with Android 16
updates.subtitle: Screen orientation behavior changes for tablets
updates.content: Starting with Android 16, Android stops enforcing screen orientation on devices with 600dp and larger display settings. This change impacts the Managed Home Screen (MHS) on devices with larger form factors, like tablets.
features: Orientation determined by device setting, not MHS

updates.title: New settings available in the Apple settings catalog
updates.subtitle: iOS/iPadOS and macOS configuration options
updates.content: New settings added to the Apple settings catalog including Idle Reboot Allowed for iOS/iPadOS, Microsoft Edge policy updates for macOS, and Allow Device Identifiers In Attestation.
features: macOS: Updated Microsoft Edge policies (hundreds of new settings)
macOS: Allow Device Identifiers In Attestation
Apple deprecated Identification payload in macOS 15.4

updates.title: New Block Bluetooth setting in the Android Enterprise settings catalog
updates.subtitle: Enhanced Bluetooth control for Android Enterprise devices
updates.content: New Block Bluetooth setting and Block Bluetooth Configuration setting for Android Enterprise devices. These settings provide different levels of Bluetooth control and user interaction.
features: Block Bluetooth Configuration setting (prevents user changes)
Different behavior based on user's previous Bluetooth state

updates.title: New reporting system for improved performance and data consistency
updates.subtitle: Policy Reporting Service (PRS) V3 rollout
updates.content: Microsoft Intune is rolling out the new Policy Reporting Service (PRS) V3. The new system brings faster report generation, improved reliability, and better data consistency.
features: Automatic transition for compliance and device configuration reports
Quicker updates in Intune admin center

updates.title: New attributes and S/MIME baseline requirements for SCEP certificate profiles
updates.subtitle: Enhanced certificate security requirements
updates.content: Intune supports two new attributes for subject name settings in SCEP and PKCS device configuration profiles. Beginning July 16th, public CAs require these attributes for S/MIME certificates.
features: Required for S/MIME certificates from public CAs (starting July 16th)

updates.title: Newly available protected apps for Intune
updates.subtitle: Four new protected applications available
updates.content: The following protected apps are now available for Microsoft Intune: Datasite for Intune, Mijn InPlanning, Nitro PDF Pro, and SMART TeamWorks.
features: Mijn InPlanning by Intus Workforce Solutions (iOS)
Nitro PDF Pro by Nitro Software, Inc. (iOS)
SMART TeamWorks by SMART Technologies ULC (iOS)

updates.title: New status column in Windows hardware attestation report
updates.subtitle: Enhanced visibility into attestation errors
updates.content: Added a new column, Attest Status, to the Windows hardware attestation report to improve visibility into attestation errors. This column shows error messages received during the attestation process.
features: New Attest Status column in reports
